Package ft

Interface Summary
Constants constants, masks, etc.
Interface.AnalogObserver must be implemented to observe values of analog inputs.
Interface.CycleObserver must be implemented to observe state refresh cycles.
Interface.DigitalObserver must be implemented to observe edges and digital inputs.
Interface.MotorObserver must be implemented to observe changes of motor states.
 

Class Summary
AnalogView displays the value of an analog input.
Controller abstract base class for control programs.
Diagnose diagnostic panel for fischertechnik interface.
EdgeButton displays the edge count of a digital input.
EdgeView displays the edge count of a digital input.
Interface manages connection to the interface.
Interface.Model base class for models, manages state and calls observers.
Interface.Model.Change declares callback from notifyObservers() back to Model.
Interface.Queue used to detach notifying any model's observers from changing the model's state.
MotorButton influences and displays the state of a motor.
MotorView displays the state of a motor.
ScaledView displays the scaled value of an analog input.
StepMotor influences and displays the state of a motor.
Stepper influences and displays the state of a motor.
TouchView displays the state of a digital input with a background color.
